name: PEDIATRIX MEDICAL GROUP (MEDNAX NATIONAL MEDICAL GROUP)
description: National medical provider of neonatal, pediatric, and anesthesiology physician services.
sampleDescriptions: Support for H.R. 2662 / S. 1250 - Restoring Accountability in the Indian Health Services Act of 2017.
Expanding Veterans Health Administration coverage to non-employed physicians. Support for H.R. 5674 VA Mission Act of 2018.
Physician access to Indian Health Services.
Expanding Veterans Health Administration coverage to non-employed physicians.
Surprise Billing Reform.

Support for surprise billing reform, including H.R. 3502, to amend the Public Health Service Act and title XI of the Social Security Act to protect health care consumers from surprise billing practices, and for other purposes; H.R. 3630, the No Surprises Act; S. 1895, the Lower Health Care Costs Act; and S. 1531, the Stopping The Outrageous Practice of Surprise Medical Bills Act of 2019.
Support for surprise billing reform, including S. 1895, the Lower Health Care Costs Act, and H.R. 3630, the No Surprises Act.
Surprise billing reform, including S. 1895, the Lower Health Care Costs Act, and H.R. 3630, the No Surprises Act.
Implementation of the Public Health and Social Services Emergency Fund in H.R. 748.

Surprise billing reform, including S. 1895, the Lower Health Care Costs Act, H.R. 3630, the No Surprises Act, H.R. 5826, the Consumer Protections Against Surprise Medical Bills Act, and H.R. 5800, the Ban Surprise Bills Act. S. 3559/H.R. 6365, the Immediate Relief for Rural Facilities and Providers Act of 2020. Insurance contract issues in the private market.
